pullrequest.title: update TurtleBot3 models and add TurtleBot3 House

content.raw: Could you change the model name to match the name in the config file? i.e. `turtlebot3_world`? I would also suggest, if possible, to call it something other than "world", so it doesn't confuse users thinking this is a "gazebo world" (`.world` file). Maybe `turtlebot3_arena`?
content.html: Could you change the model name to match the name in the config file? i.e. turtlebot3_world? I would also suggest, if possible, to call it something other than "world", so it doesn't confuse users thinking this is a "gazebo world" (.world file). Maybe turtlebot3_arena?
